items.title: FanFan — With its state of the art Fan Simulation Engine, FanFan can bring back that soothing sound of computer fans to your M1 Mac.
Monodraw’ is a Multi-Purpose Mac ASCII Editor
Q. about Affinity Designer and Photo
items.content_text: How does it compare to photoshop? I used to do a lot of photoshop on my windows laptop. And I wanted to try something that’s native for M1 machines and found affinity. The programs are currently on sale and thinking about getting them. Are they limited in things you can do with them?

items.title: Show battery percentage and get notified at custom levels in mac menubar
Setapp announces Yac partnership with fifteen app Collection.
What app/s do you use for file organization?
items.content_text:
I'm currently archiving some files to a new hard drive and would want to know if there are apps that can make digital organization easy and smooth. Especially in creating folders with different names all at once.  


Thanks in advance!
